AzureBlade: Here I go.

He walks towards the decepticon and puts his hand on both sides of his 
head. He slowly tries to establish mind contact.

AzureBlade: If something goes wrong, he might awaken and be mad. In 
that case... use extreme prejudice...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nightstrike:::
> 
> Nightstrike continued shoutting, insulting and fightting, soon he 
> felt tired and his arms and legs were getting heavy with the 
minutes. 
> His sight was blurred. At least, he just could said to someone that 
> he belived that was Epyon "You..won't cacht me... Scum" 
> 
> Nightstrike eyes fought to be opened, he opened and close them... 
> until they definitybly he closed them... After a deep sight, 
> Nightstrike was sedated... after 20 minutes.
> 
>
